001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.exceptions;
002
003/**
004 * A generic unchecked exception for Selenium-based UI interaction errors.
005 * Use this to wrap any unexpected behavior during UI automation or component actions.
006 *
007 * <p>Example use cases:
008 * - Element not found or not interactable
009 * - Unexpected page state
010 * - Component logic failure
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
013 */
014public class UiInteractionException extends RuntimeException {
015
016   /**
017    * Constructs a new UiInteractionException with the specified detail message.
018    *
019    * @param message the detail message.
020    */
021   public UiInteractionException(String message) {
022      super(message);
023   }
024
025   /**
026    * Constructs a new UiInteractionException with the specified detail message and cause.
027    *
028    * @param message the detail message.
029    * @param cause   the cause of the exception.
030    */
031   public UiInteractionException(String message, Throwable cause) {
032      super(message, cause);
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Constructs a new UiInteractionException with the specified cause.
037    *
038    * @param cause the cause of the exception.
039    */
040   public UiInteractionException(Throwable cause) {
041      super(cause);
042   }
043}
